import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import "./Checkout.css" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import Loading from '../../components/loading/Loading' const Checkout = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const productId = useParams().productId const fetchProduct = async () => { setLoading(true) const response = await fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/${productId}`) const data = await response.json() setProduct(data) setLoading(false) } useEffect(() => { fetchProduct() }, [productId]) console.log(product) return ( <> {loading ? : product &&

Checkout

Item Total Amount : ${product.price}

* Items will be delivered in 3 - 5 days.
* Tax and other charges are included.

Basic Information

Cash on Delivery Mode
Online Payment Mode
}
) } export default Checkout
